content.rendered:
Training

At Lucy beauty studio & academy, We offer a 3-day training course in lash extensions and semi permanent brows. The first day consists in learning the theory, the second and third day for the practice.

Eyelash extensions course

3 days training (18 hours)
  • Classic eyelash extensions
  • Hybrid eyelash extensions
  • Volume eyelash extensitons
  • Wispy lash extensions
  • Lash extensions removal
  • Product knowledge
  • Tips and tricks
  • Marketing and photo editing
  • Live Models
  • Lifetime support
  • Eyelash extensions kit ( tweezers, lashes, glue, eyepatches, tapes…)
  • Certificate
Register now
To register the course, It is required $200 for the deposit

Semi Permanent Brows Course

3 days training (21 hours)
  • Ombre Powder Brows / Nano Hair Stroke Brows
  • Supplies & Tools
  • Sanitation
  • Set Up & Clean Up
  • Brow Mapping
  • Colour Theory
  • Structure of the Skin
  • Full Procedure - Step-by-Step
  • Contraindications
  • Consent Forms & Client Instructions
  • Photos & Editing
  • Live models
  • Life time support
  • Full brow kit ( machine, pigments, tools…)
Register now
To register the course, It is required $200 for the deposit

REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR COURSES

CONSCIENTIOUS

Follow up with each student. Monitor and check results daily.

REPUTATION

90% practice committed to solid workmanship. Professional and comprehensive training program. Provided certificate by Lucy

LECTURERS

Full of knowledge and experience. Enthusiastic and dedicated.

TRAINING ENVIRONMENT

Modern types of equipment. Top-notch and comfortable facilities.

WHAT STUDENTS GET
AFTER THE COURSE?

01

Review all previously studied techniques, and update new techniques through the company’s online study group.

02

A certificate is provided by a Lucy

03

A starter kit (include: tweezer, classic & volume lash, glue, carrying bag…)

04

Get the discount of 20% off all supplies lifetime. Support Lifetime

PRACTICE CLASS PHOTOS

SUBSCRIBE

For more information, please contact us or fill in the form below. We will get back to you as soon as possible, thank you!
